Multiple Layout Options

Choose from four different layout styles to match your content and audience. Each layout is designed for specific use cases and preferences.

Classic

Traditional Blog Layout

Classic Blog

Traditional blog layout with clean typography and familiar structure. Perfect for content-focused blogs and personal journals.

  • Traditional blog structure
  • Clean typography
  • Content-focused design
View Classic Layout

Magazine

Dynamic Grid Layout

Magazine Style

Dynamic grid layout with featured content highlights. Perfect for content-rich blogs and digital magazines.

  • Dynamic grid layouts
  • Featured content highlights
  • Content discovery focus
View Magazine Layout

Portfolio

Professional Showcase

Portfolio Focus

Showcase your work and skills with a professional portfolio layout. Perfect for developers, designers, and creative professionals.

  • Professional appearance
  • Skills showcase
  • Project highlights
View Portfolio Layout

Minimalist

Clean & Simple

Minimalist Design

Clean, uncluttered design that focuses on content and typography. Perfect for writers, thinkers, and minimalists.

  • Clean typography
  • Generous whitespace
  • Content-first approach
View Minimalist Layout

Why Multiple Layouts?

Different content types and audiences require different approaches

Audience Match

Choose the layout that best matches your target audience's expectations and preferences.

Content Type

Different content types (articles, projects, thoughts) work better with different layouts.

Brand Identity

Each layout conveys a different personality and brand identity for your blog.

Ready to Choose Your Layout?

Explore each layout to find the perfect match for your content and audience.
